nodes.text: Gazdo Woolcob was a male pilot who served the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War, and flew as Gold Seven with Gold Squadron. He participated in an attack on the planet Scarif to help steal the plans for a superweapon of the Galactic Empire. He was later killed in the Battle of Yavin, when his Y-wing was destroyed by flak from the Death Star's anti-ship battery fire. Around the time of his death, he had accrued 4,816 flight hours and four confirmed kills.
